title: Karnataka: Halal meat issue being raised to disturb peace, says Siddaramaiah - The Indian Express
content:
1. Karnataka: Halal meat issue being raised to disturb peace, says Siddaramaiah  The Indian Express
  2. Bengaluru: Five BD workers arrested for attacking Muslim meat seller, CM calls for peace  Daijiworld.com
  3. Amid halal meat row, BBMP told to stun animals before slaughter  The News Minute
  4. Explained: Why Muslim vendors are being banned from Karnataka temple fairs  The Indian Express
  5. After hijab vs saffron shawls, it's now halal vs jhatka in polarised Karnataka  Daijiworld.com
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: By raising divisive issues the BJP and its affiliates are disturbing peace in the state which will have ripple effects on the economic growth in the state, Siddaramaiah said.
